onLoad:
0&&(async function() { const at='pointer';  await api.window([`Here, human senses have no power.

This interface links to thought.

Link green to blue.`, [{tag:'i', style:'font-size:.85em'}, `

    (Click repeatedly to skip text.)`]], at, 6) })()
onWon:
0&&(async function() { const at='pointer';  api.levelSuggest('levels/tutorial/2.json');  await api.window('Wonderful.', at, 3);  await api.window('You can hear me then.', at, 3);  await api.window(`You may experience dizziness and hallucinations in your vision and hearing.

This is normal, as your senses are currently repurposed for information.

Try to get used to it.`, at);  await api.window(`Let's run through a couple exercises.

They are not complicated, but mastery of basics will serve you well.`, at);  await api.window([{tag:'button'}, 'Go'], at, 2);  api.levelLoad('levels/tutorial/2.json') })()
onLost:
const n = api['tutorial1 lost'] = api['tutorial1 lost']+1 || 0 
 api.window([`What? Are you lost, then?

Braindead?

No. Try again.`, `Stop fooling around.

You have to actually try to not put green into blue. This is so easy.`, `GET. IT. IN. THERE.`, `Yes. Very funny joke. We are all very impressed, and laughing at your wit, hard as steel.

Now do this normally.`, `We have a tutorial to go through. There will be time for pretty green colors later.`][n % 5]) 
 setTimeout(api.levelLoad, 3000)
